text:
Canada Life is focused
on improving the financial,

physical, and mental
wellbeings of Canadians.
We were attempting to lift and shift all
of our APIs from on-prem to AWS Cloud.
Unfortunately, all

of our APIs had existing
security vulnerabilities

that needed to be remediated
prior to moving over

to the cloud. Using Amazon
Q Developer transformation

capabilities, we were hoping
to reduce the time that it took
for upgrading

and remediating our
security vulnerabilities
within our APIs.
Amazon Q has helped us with operations

by reducing the risk
of failure in outages,

having enabled us to move
our APIs to the cloud.
The results were on average

we were able to improve
productivity by 40%.
Building on AWS empowers our business

and the customer experience by
increasing the availability,
resiliency, and performance
of our front end digital systems.
